messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Re: Correction to post..
messages.msgSnippet: Pete, I must be wrong to say that Ezo menuki were not suri-hegashi gilded, after all why use expensive silver in the base metal if it is not going to be seen.
messages.messageBody:
Pete,
I must be wrong to say that Ezo menuki were not suri-hegashi gilded, after all why use expensive silver in the base metal if it is not going to be seen.
Alan

Subject: [nihontostudy] Re: Correction to post..


My pleasure Alan. Have a great weekend!
Pete

messages.msgSnippet: Hi Pete, Thanks for the info, this is all new to me and very interesting. Alan ... From: klepet33319 To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com Sent: Friday, June 02,
messages.messageBody:
Hi Pete,
Thanks for the info, this is all new to me and very interesting.
Alan
----- Original Message -----
From: klepet33319
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, June 02, 2006 11:03 PM
Subject: [nihontostudy] Correction to post..


In re-reading the post I realized I made an error. The paragraph on
Buttweiler's thoughts is NOT from Heckmann but my own reading. I
forgot the close quote in the previous paragraph. That and a few
typos. I better keep my day job and not try for secretary!

messages.subject: Correction to post..
messages.msgSnippet: In re-reading the post I realized I made an error.  The paragraph on Buttweiler s thoughts is NOT from Heckmann but my own reading.  I forgot the close quote
messages.messageBody:
In re-reading the post I realized I made an error. The paragraph on
Buttweiler's thoughts is NOT from Heckmann but my own reading. I
forgot the close quote in the previous paragraph. That and a few
typos. I better keep my day job and not try for secretary!
